Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 49th overall pick, by Minnesota in 1974...
Had first career hit on 4/13/1978, off Roogie Rigsby (TOL)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/4/1979, off Loren Lyons (Mal)...
Won World Championship with Minnesota in 1979...
Drove in 6 runs against Toledo on 4/22/1982...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston (FBA) on 4/19/1983...
Signed as a free agent by Capital City on 2/16/1984 to a 3-year deal worth $478,800 per year...
Traded from Capital City to New Jersey on 5/23/1984 (Going to NJ: CF P. Hurtado. Going to CC: 2B M. Moreno, P J. Green)...
Signed as a free agent by Capital City on 3/1/1987 to a minor league contract.
